kw.doc: Log the provided command. If no command is provided then log the
kw.msg: BGP summary information for VRF default Router identifier 10.0.1.102, local AS number 65101 Neighbor Status Codes: m - Under maintenance Neighbor V AS MsgRcvd MsgSent InQ OutQ Up/Down State PfxRcd PfxAcc 10.1.102.1 4 65001 8305 8317 0 0 00:00:04 Idle(Admin) 0 0 10.2.102.1 4 65001 8264 8286 0 0 4d20h Estab 11 11

suite.doc: This test changes a BGP neighbor statement to the wrong AS to verify that the neighbor state becomes un-established. The test reverts the neighbor statement to it's proper state.

errors.msg: Multiple test cases with name 'PEER Established' executed in test suite 'Run Full Suite.Bgp-Test'.
